summary: THE CONSUMER'S CHILDREN WERE ABLE TO UNFASTENED THE HARNESS WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION. THE CONSUMER CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURER WHO ADVISED THE PROBLEM WAS COMMON AND OFFERED TO SALE A COVER TO PREVENT UNBUCKLING OF HARNESS.  CSS INFO:  BRITAX/ADVANTAGE E902228/06-14-01-----BOTH SEATS.                *JB
